calculation.all: 1.2 * average_operating_working_capital / average_assets + 1.4 * average_retained_earnings_accumulated_deficit / average_assets + 3.3 * operating_income_loss / average_assets + 0.6 * market_capitalization / average_liabilities + average_revenue / average_assets
